ja546:20.2.pli: Yadi te suto vidhuro nāma kattā;

ja546:92.4.pli: Na no sabhāyaṃ na karonti kiñci”.

ja546:97.4.pli: So me jito taṃ me avākarohi”.

ja546:98.1.pli: “Attā ca me so saraṇaṃ gatī ca,

ja546:98.2.pli: Dīpo ca leṇo ca parāyaṇo ca;

ja546:103.3.pli: Bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca rañño,

ja546:129.4.pli: Mā hevaṃ deva na hi esa dhammo;

ja546:185.2.pli: Atthe ca dhamme ca yutto bhavassu;

ja546:186.4.pli: Na ca mayha kodhatthi vajāmi cāhaṃ”.

ja546:216.4.pli: Bhāve ca te kusalaṃ natthi kiñci.

ja546:225.2.pli: Hadayena me yadi te atthi kiccaṃ;

ja546:228.2.pli: Hadayena me yadi te atthi kiccaṃ;

ja546:230.3.pli: Asatī ca kā ko pana mittadubbho,

ja546:235.3.pli: Asatī ca sā so pana mittadubbho,

ja546:261.1.pli: Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,

ja546:281.2.pli: Na sayaṃ kataṃ nāpi devehi dinnaṃ;

ja546:285.1.pli: Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,

ja546:308.3.pli: Yadi te suto puṇṇako nāma yakkho,

ja546:311.3.pli: Atthe ca dhamme ca ṭhito nipāko,

ja546:314.1.pli: Ye keci baddhā mama atthi raṭṭhe,
